pageContext.description: Edges badly hacked. Fracture shows no blow holes - bent near fracture, showing probably intentional fracture.
pageContext.patina: Remains of dark green patina, bronze shows through, other parts a lightish brown, a very high glaze on parts of the blue (? green) & brown.
pageContext.associations: A hoard containing at least 53 articles in 63 fragments, mostly swords, spearheads, ferrules & rings.
pageContext.publications: Whilte, Gilbert: Nat. Hist. of Selborne, Macmillan, 1876, 254-8,White, Gilbert: Nat. Hist. of Selborne, Ed. Bell,1877, 381.
pageContext.site: England,Hampshire,Selborne,In garden of a cottage on western side of road ascending from Eveley corner to Hogmoor.,Spring 1870
